portal-chamber.name: Portal chamber
portal-chamber.description: You see four portal stations, blue, green, red, and yellow. The yellow one isn't working, but the other three are. You also notice a writing on the wall: 'Follow the Ridiculously Gorgeous and Greatly Rusty Radish.'

old-metal-key.name: Old Metal Key
old-metal-key.description: This key can be used to open the old wooden door

black-mouth-mask.name: Black Mouth Mask
black-mouth-mask.description: A black mouth mask that can be worn on your face

portal-puzzel-step-1.name: Step 1
portal-puzzel-step-1.description: You are send back to the middle of the room, but the yellow portal station, something starts to glow.

portal-puzzel-step-2.name: Step 2
portal-puzzel-step-2.description: Send back again, but the glow starts to increase in size and brightness.

portal-puzzel-step-2-fail.name: Step 2
portal-puzzel-step-2-fail.description: The glow that was there a second ago disappeared again.

portal-puzzel-step-3.name: Step 3
portal-puzzel-step-3.description: The glow grows again, it starts to look like a portal, but too small.

portal-puzzel-step-3-fail.name: Step 3
portal-puzzel-step-3-fail.description: The glow that was growing has now disappeared.

portal-puzzel-step-4.name: Step 4
portal-puzzel-step-4.description: The portal size increases again, but isn't as large as the other portals yet.

portal-puzzel-step-4-fail.name: Step 4
portal-puzzel-step-4-fail.description: The small portal grows smaller and then disappears leaving some shiny particles that dim slowly until they're gone.

portal-puzzel-step-5.name: Step 5
portal-puzzel-step-5.description: The yellow portal now has a normal size, you can probably use it now.

portal-puzzel-step-5-fail.name: Step 5
portal-puzzel-step-5-fail.description: The portal starts to pulsate faster and faster until it explodes leaving an empty portal station once again.
